member.name: T:Enemies.Zombie
member.summary: Represents a Zombie with health and a name.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets health to 0.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified health value.
member.param: The health value. Must be greater than or equal to 0.
member.exception: Thrown when the value is less than 0.

member.name: P:Enemies.Zombie.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Zombie.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.GetHealth
member.summary: Gets the health of the Zombie.
